info.title: Payment Service
info.description:
# Introduction

The Dojo API is RESTful. It returns HTTP response codes to indicate errors.  It also
accepts and returns JSON in the HTTP body. 

# Authentication

TBA

Never share your secret keys. Keep them guarded and secure.

# Errors

Dojo follows the error response format proposed in [RFC 7807](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7807) also known as Problem Details for HTTP APIs.

# Versioning

TBA

# Getting started guide

TBA

post.description: The method allows you to collect a pre-auth payment intent that has previously been created but not yet refunded or reversed. You can collect the full amount or a partial amount.

parameters.name: paymentIntentId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the payment intent.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url https://remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev//api/payment-intents/%7BpaymentIntentId%7D/collections \
  --header 'Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"amount":{"value":100,"currencyCode":"GBP"}}'

echo '{"amount":{"value":100,"currencyCode":"GBP"}}' |  \
  http POST https://remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev//api/payment-intents/%7BpaymentIntentId%7D/collections \
  Authorization:REPLACE_KEY_VALUE \
  content-type:application/json

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev")

payload = "{\"amount\":{\"value\":100,\"currencyCode\":\"GBP\"}}"

headers = {
    'content-type': "application/json",
    'Authorization': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
    }

conn.request("POST", "//api/payment-intents/%7BpaymentIntentId%7D/collections", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev//api/payment-intents/%7BpaymentIntentId%7D/collections",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"amount\":{\"value\":100,\"currencyCode\":\"GBP\"}}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    "content-type: application/json"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

<?php

$request = new HttpRequest();
$request->setUrl('https://remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev//api/payment-intents/%7BpaymentIntentId%7D/collections');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_METH_POST);

$request->setHeaders([
  'content-type' => 'application/json',
  'Authorization' => 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
]);

$request->setBody('{"amount":{"value":100,"currencyCode":"GBP"}}');

try {
  $response = $request->send();

  echo $response->getBody();
} catch (HttpException $ex) {
  echo $ex;
}

<?php

$client = new http\Client;
$request = new http\Client\Request;

$body = new http\Message\Body;
$body->append('{"amount":{"value":100,"currencyCode":"GBP"}}');

$request->setRequestUrl('https://remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev//api/payment-intents/%7BpaymentIntentId%7D/collections');
$request->setRequestMethod('POST');
$request->setBody($body);

$request->setHeaders([
  'content-type' => 'application/json',
  'Authorization' => 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
]);

$client->enqueue($request)->send();
$response = $client->getResponse();

echo $response->getBody();

parameters.name: paymentIntentId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the payment intent.

get.description: Retrieves the details of a payment intent. Supply the unique payment ID from either a payment intent creation request.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request GET \
  --url https://remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev//api/payment-intents/%7BpaymentIntentId%7D \
  --header 'Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'

http GET https://remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev//api/payment-intents/%7BpaymentIntentId%7D \
  Authorization:REPLACE_KEY_VALUE

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev")

headers = { 'Authorization': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE" }

conn.request("GET", "//api/payment-intents/%7BpaymentIntentId%7D", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev//api/payment-intents/%7BpaymentIntentId%7D",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

<?php

$request = new HttpRequest();
$request->setUrl('https://remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev//api/payment-intents/%7BpaymentIntentId%7D');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_METH_GET);

$request->setHeaders([
  'Authorization' => 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
]);

try {
  $response = $request->send();

  echo $response->getBody();
} catch (HttpException $ex) {
  echo $ex;
}

<?php

$client = new http\Client;
$request = new http\Client\Request;

$request->setRequestUrl('https://remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev//api/payment-intents/%7BpaymentIntentId%7D');
$request->setRequestMethod('GET');
$request->setHeaders([
  'Authorization' => 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
]);

$client->enqueue($request)->send();
$response = $client->getResponse();

echo $response->getBody();

post.description: A Payment Intent is the process of collecting a payment from a customer.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url https://remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev//api/payment-intents \
  --header 'Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"locationId":"string","captureMode":"string","amount":{"value":0,"currencyCode":"string"},"reference":"string","description":"string","customer":{"emailAddress":"string","phoneNumber":"string"},"billingAddress":{"address1":"string","address2":"string","address3":"string","address4":"string","city":"London","state":"string","postcode":"string","countryCode":"GB","locality":"string","county":"string"},"shippingDetails":{"name":"string","deliveryNotes":"string","address":{"address1":"string","address2":"string","address3":"string","address4":"string","city":"London","state":"string","postcode":"string","countryCode":"GB","locality":"string","county":"string"}},"transactionSource":"MOTO","config":{"userEmail":{"collectionRequired":true}},"requestSecurity":{"userAgent":"string","ipAddress":"string","device":"string"},"itemLines":[{"id":"string","quantity":0,"caption":"string","amountTotal":{"value":0,"currencyCode":"string"}}],"taxLines":[{"id":"string","caption":"string","subCaption":"string","amountTotal":{"value":0,"currencyCode":"string"}}],"actionLink":{"url":"http://example.com","action":"\"OpenLink\"","label":"string","fileName":"string"},"paymentSource":"string","metadata":{"property1":"string","property2":"string"}}'

echo '{"locationId":"string","captureMode":"string","amount":{"value":0,"currencyCode":"string"},"reference":"string","description":"string","customer":{"emailAddress":"string","phoneNumber":"string"},"billingAddress":{"address1":"string","address2":"string","address3":"string","address4":"string","city":"London","state":"string","postcode":"string","countryCode":"GB","locality":"string","county":"string"},"shippingDetails":{"name":"string","deliveryNotes":"string","address":{"address1":"string","address2":"string","address3":"string","address4":"string","city":"London","state":"string","postcode":"string","countryCode":"GB","locality":"string","county":"string"}},"transactionSource":"MOTO","config":{"userEmail":{"collectionRequired":true}},"requestSecurity":{"userAgent":"string","ipAddress":"string","device":"string"},"itemLines":[{"id":"string","quantity":0,"caption":"string","amountTotal":{"value":0,"currencyCode":"string"}}],"taxLines":[{"id":"string","caption":"string","subCaption":"string","amountTotal":{"value":0,"currencyCode":"string"}}],"actionLink":{"url":"http://example.com","action":"\"OpenLink\"","label":"string","fileName":"string"},"paymentSource":"string","metadata":{"property1":"string","property2":"string"}}' |  \
  http POST https://remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev//api/payment-intents \
  Authorization:REPLACE_KEY_VALUE \
  content-type:application/json

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev")

payload = "{\"locationId\":\"string\",\"captureMode\":\"string\",\"amount\":{\"value\":0,\"currencyCode\":\"string\"},\"reference\":\"string\",\"description\":\"string\",\"customer\":{\"emailAddress\":\"string\",\"phoneNumber\":\"string\"},\"billingAddress\":{\"address1\":\"string\",\"address2\":\"string\",\"address3\":\"string\",\"address4\":\"string\",\"city\":\"London\",\"state\":\"string\",\"postcode\":\"string\",\"countryCode\":\"GB\",\"locality\":\"string\",\"county\":\"string\"},\"shippingDetails\":{\"name\":\"string\",\"deliveryNotes\":\"string\",\"address\":{\"address1\":\"string\",\"address2\":\"string\",\"address3\":\"string\",\"address4\":\"string\",\"city\":\"London\",\"state\":\"string\",\"postcode\":\"string\",\"countryCode\":\"GB\",\"locality\":\"string\",\"county\":\"string\"}},\"transactionSource\":\"MOTO\",\"config\":{\"userEmail\":{\"collectionRequired\":true}},\"requestSecurity\":{\"userAgent\":\"string\",\"ipAddress\":\"string\",\"device\":\"string\"},\"itemLines\":[{\"id\":\"string\",\"quantity\":0,\"caption\":\"string\",\"amountTotal\":{\"value\":0,\"currencyCode\":\"string\"}}],\"taxLines\":[{\"id\":\"string\",\"caption\":\"string\",\"subCaption\":\"string\",\"amountTotal\":{\"value\":0,\"currencyCode\":\"string\"}}],\"actionLink\":{\"url\":\"http://example.com\",\"action\":\"\\\"OpenLink\\\"\",\"label\":\"string\",\"fileName\":\"string\"},\"paymentSource\":\"string\",\"metadata\":{\"property1\":\"string\",\"property2\":\"string\"}}"

headers = {
    'content-type': "application/json",
    'Authorization': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
    }

conn.request("POST", "//api/payment-intents", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev//api/payment-intents",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"locationId\":\"string\",\"captureMode\":\"string\",\"amount\":{\"value\":0,\"currencyCode\":\"string\"},\"reference\":\"string\",\"description\":\"string\",\"customer\":{\"emailAddress\":\"string\",\"phoneNumber\":\"string\"},\"billingAddress\":{\"address1\":\"string\",\"address2\":\"string\",\"address3\":\"string\",\"address4\":\"string\",\"city\":\"London\",\"state\":\"string\",\"postcode\":\"string\",\"countryCode\":\"GB\",\"locality\":\"string\",\"county\":\"string\"},\"shippingDetails\":{\"name\":\"string\",\"deliveryNotes\":\"string\",\"address\":{\"address1\":\"string\",\"address2\":\"string\",\"address3\":\"string\",\"address4\":\"string\",\"city\":\"London\",\"state\":\"string\",\"postcode\":\"string\",\"countryCode\":\"GB\",\"locality\":\"string\",\"county\":\"string\"}},\"transactionSource\":\"MOTO\",\"config\":{\"userEmail\":{\"collectionRequired\":true}},\"requestSecurity\":{\"userAgent\":\"string\",\"ipAddress\":\"string\",\"device\":\"string\"},\"itemLines\":[{\"id\":\"string\",\"quantity\":0,\"caption\":\"string\",\"amountTotal\":{\"value\":0,\"currencyCode\":\"string\"}}],\"taxLines\":[{\"id\":\"string\",\"caption\":\"string\",\"subCaption\":\"string\",\"amountTotal\":{\"value\":0,\"currencyCode\":\"string\"}}],\"actionLink\":{\"url\":\"http://example.com\",\"action\":\"\\\"OpenLink\\\"\",\"label\":\"string\",\"fileName\":\"string\"},\"paymentSource\":\"string\",\"metadata\":{\"property1\":\"string\",\"property2\":\"string\"}}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    "content-type: application/json"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

<?php

$request = new HttpRequest();
$request->setUrl('https://remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev//api/payment-intents');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_METH_POST);

$request->setHeaders([
  'content-type' => 'application/json',
  'Authorization' => 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
]);

$request->setBody('{"locationId":"string","captureMode":"string","amount":{"value":0,"currencyCode":"string"},"reference":"string","description":"string","customer":{"emailAddress":"string","phoneNumber":"string"},"billingAddress":{"address1":"string","address2":"string","address3":"string","address4":"string","city":"London","state":"string","postcode":"string","countryCode":"GB","locality":"string","county":"string"},"shippingDetails":{"name":"string","deliveryNotes":"string","address":{"address1":"string","address2":"string","address3":"string","address4":"string","city":"London","state":"string","postcode":"string","countryCode":"GB","locality":"string","county":"string"}},"transactionSource":"MOTO","config":{"userEmail":{"collectionRequired":true}},"requestSecurity":{"userAgent":"string","ipAddress":"string","device":"string"},"itemLines":[{"id":"string","quantity":0,"caption":"string","amountTotal":{"value":0,"currencyCode":"string"}}],"taxLines":[{"id":"string","caption":"string","subCaption":"string","amountTotal":{"value":0,"currencyCode":"string"}}],"actionLink":{"url":"http://example.com","action":"\\"OpenLink\\"","label":"string","fileName":"string"},"paymentSource":"string","metadata":{"property1":"string","property2":"string"}}');

try {
  $response = $request->send();

  echo $response->getBody();
} catch (HttpException $ex) {
  echo $ex;
}

<?php

$client = new http\Client;
$request = new http\Client\Request;

$body = new http\Message\Body;
$body->append('{"locationId":"string","captureMode":"string","amount":{"value":0,"currencyCode":"string"},"reference":"string","description":"string","customer":{"emailAddress":"string","phoneNumber":"string"},"billingAddress":{"address1":"string","address2":"string","address3":"string","address4":"string","city":"London","state":"string","postcode":"string","countryCode":"GB","locality":"string","county":"string"},"shippingDetails":{"name":"string","deliveryNotes":"string","address":{"address1":"string","address2":"string","address3":"string","address4":"string","city":"London","state":"string","postcode":"string","countryCode":"GB","locality":"string","county":"string"}},"transactionSource":"MOTO","config":{"userEmail":{"collectionRequired":true}},"requestSecurity":{"userAgent":"string","ipAddress":"string","device":"string"},"itemLines":[{"id":"string","quantity":0,"caption":"string","amountTotal":{"value":0,"currencyCode":"string"}}],"taxLines":[{"id":"string","caption":"string","subCaption":"string","amountTotal":{"value":0,"currencyCode":"string"}}],"actionLink":{"url":"http://example.com","action":"\\"OpenLink\\"","label":"string","fileName":"string"},"paymentSource":"string","metadata":{"property1":"string","property2":"string"}}');

$request->setRequestUrl('https://remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev//api/payment-intents');
$request->setRequestMethod('POST');
$request->setBody($body);

$request->setHeaders([
  'content-type' => 'application/json',
  'Authorization' => 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
]);

$client->enqueue($request)->send();
$response = $client->getResponse();

echo $response->getBody();

post.description:
The method allows you to return a payment that has previously been created but not yet refunded. Payments that have been pre-authorized, but not collected, cannot be refunded.
You can refund the full amount or a partial amount.

parameters.name: paymentIntentId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the payment intent.

parameters.name: idempotencyKey
parameters.description: An optional idempotency key to recognize subsequent retries of the same request. How you generate the idempotency key is up to you. Must be unique for each new refund for the payment intent.

200.description: Returns the CreateRefundResponse object if the refund succeeded.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url https://remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev//api/payment-intents/%7BpaymentIntentId%7D/refunds \
  --header 'Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --header 'idempotencyKey: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --data '{"amount":{"value":100,"currencyCode":"GBP"},"refundReason":"Duplicate transaction","notes":"notes"}'

echo '{"amount":{"value":100,"currencyCode":"GBP"},"refundReason":"Duplicate transaction","notes":"notes"}' |  \
  http POST https://remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev//api/payment-intents/%7BpaymentIntentId%7D/refunds \
  Authorization:REPLACE_KEY_VALUE \
  content-type:application/json \
  idempotencyKey:SOME_STRING_VALUE

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev")

payload = "{\"amount\":{\"value\":100,\"currencyCode\":\"GBP\"},\"refundReason\":\"Duplicate transaction\",\"notes\":\"notes\"}"

headers = {
    'content-type': "application/json",
    'idempotencyKey': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'Authorization': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
    }

conn.request("POST", "//api/payment-intents/%7BpaymentIntentId%7D/refunds", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev//api/payment-intents/%7BpaymentIntentId%7D/refunds",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"amount\":{\"value\":100,\"currencyCode\":\"GBP\"},\"refundReason\":\"Duplicate transaction\",\"notes\":\"notes\"}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    "content-type: application/json",
    "idempotencyKey: SOME_STRING_VALUE"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

<?php

$request = new HttpRequest();
$request->setUrl('https://remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev//api/payment-intents/%7BpaymentIntentId%7D/refunds');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_METH_POST);

$request->setHeaders([
  'content-type' => 'application/json',
  'idempotencyKey' => 'SOME_STRING_VALUE',
  'Authorization' => 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
]);

$request->setBody('{"amount":{"value":100,"currencyCode":"GBP"},"refundReason":"Duplicate transaction","notes":"notes"}');

try {
  $response = $request->send();

  echo $response->getBody();
} catch (HttpException $ex) {
  echo $ex;
}

<?php

$client = new http\Client;
$request = new http\Client\Request;

$body = new http\Message\Body;
$body->append('{"amount":{"value":100,"currencyCode":"GBP"},"refundReason":"Duplicate transaction","notes":"notes"}');

$request->setRequestUrl('https://remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev//api/payment-intents/%7BpaymentIntentId%7D/refunds');
$request->setRequestMethod('POST');
$request->setBody($body);

$request->setHeaders([
  'content-type' => 'application/json',
  'idempotencyKey' => 'SOME_STRING_VALUE',
  'Authorization' => 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
]);

$client->enqueue($request)->send();
$response = $client->getResponse();

echo $response->getBody();

post.description: Reversal allows to cancel a sale or pre-auth transaction.

parameters.name: paymentIntentId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the payment intent.

200.description: Returns the Reversal object if the reversal succeeded.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url https://remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev//api/payment-intents/%7BpaymentIntentId%7D/reversal \
  --header 'Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'

http POST https://remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev//api/payment-intents/%7BpaymentIntentId%7D/reversal \
  Authorization:REPLACE_KEY_VALUE

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("remote-payments-internal-gateway-dev.dojo.dev")

headers = { 'Authorization': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE" }

conn.request("POST", "//api/payment-intents/%7BpaymentIntentId%7D/reversal", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

id.description: Unique identifier for the payment intent.

transactionSource.description: Information regarding the transaction source type. `MOTO` if the source of the transaction is mail or phone. Otherwise, this field is null.

connecteTokenExpirationDate.description: The date that the Connect-e token will expire.

billingAddress.description: The address where to send the invoice.

shippingDetails.description: The address where to send the order.

reference.description: The details of the reference for the payment.

paymentSource.description: Information regarding the payment source type.

TransactionSource.description: Information regarding the transaction source type. `MOTO` if the source of the transaction is mail or phone. Otherwise, this field is null.
TransactionSource.title: TransactionSource

transactionDateTime.description: The date and time of the payment in [ISO 8601 format](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601).

expiryDate.description: The expiry month and year. Format: MM/YY.

PaymentStatusCode.description: The current status of the payment.
PaymentStatusCode.title: PaymentStatusCode

address2.description: Address line 2 (for example, street, apartment, or suite).

city.description: City, town, district, suburb, or village.

locality.description: Locality, can use in addition to city.

description.description: Description of the order for the customer.

collectionRequired.description: Whether the object will be collected.

reference.description: The details of the reference for the payment.

shippingDetails.description: The address where to send the order.
